Text: very frustrating - I have found one place already where 4.5 pages are skipped (the end of piece 3).  There may be more.
Thanks so much. The original has been so hard to find.

I would love to see his complete "Dark Tower" series all bundled into one torrent in audio book form! They never made a movie, yet in my opinion...it's his masterpiece. I thought it ended on book like 7 or so...called "The Dark Tower", but now I hear he's making what is to be the last....called "The Long Road Home"...book 8 I believe. They'll release the new book in March of 08.
The long road home is a marvels comic series. Its not a novel
